statements: UPDATE research_library SET title='New Title', author='John Doe' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE research_library SET publication_date='2022-10-15', abstract='Updated abstract' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE research_library SET title = 'New Title', author = 'John Doe', publication_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_library SET author = 'Jane Smith', publication_date = '2022-01-20', abstract = 'This is a detailed abstract.' WHERE title = 'Advanced Research Paper';
UPDATE publications SET publication_title = 'New Title' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET research_type = 'Experimental' WHERE research_project_id = 3;
UPDATE publications SET author_name = 'John Doe', publication_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET project_description = 'Updated project description', project_title = 'New Project Title' WHERE research_project_id = 3;
UPDATE publications SET author='John Doe', title='Title A' WHERE publication_id=1;
UPDATE research_projects SET researcher_name='Jane Smith', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE publications SET title = 'New Book Title', author = 'Jane Doe' WHERE publication_id = 1;
UPDATE research_projects SET end_date = '2022-12-31', researcher_name = 'John Smith' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE Publications SET journal = 'Journal of Science' WHERE publication_id = 123;
UPDATE Researchers SET area_of_expertise = ARRAY['Machine Learning'] WHERE researcher_id = 456;

UPDATE Publications SET title = 'New Title', authors = ARRAY['John Doe', 'Jane Smith'], publication_date = '2022-10-15', journal = 'Science Journal', abstract = 'Lorem ipsum', keywords = ARRAY['database', 'SQL'], project_id = 1 WHERE publication_id = 12345;

UPDATE Researchers SET full_name = 'Alice Johnson', email = 'alice@example.com', affiliation = 'Research Institute', area_of_expertise = ARRAY['Machine Learning', 'Data Mining'], projects = ARRAY[1, 2] WHERE researcher_id = 54321;
UPDATE ResearchProjects SET project_description = 'Updated description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Researchers SET researcher_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE ResearchProjects SET project_description = 'New project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE Researchers SET researcher_affiliation = 'New affiliation', researcher_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
